readable.title: 3514188115_f51932ae5d
readable.content: a boy and girl hold hands walking down a railroad track A boy and girl hold hands as they walk on railroad tracks . A boy in a striped shirt and a little girl in a blue dress walk hand in hand down the train track . Little girl and older male , holding hands and walking on train tracks . The little girl in the blue dress is walking with a man along a railway track .
